visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The x-axis should have categories for each month from January to December. The y-axis should display temperature data in degrees Celsius. The chart should have a custom color scheme with shades of blue and green. The legend should be positioned at the bottom of the chart, and the background should be light gray. The chart should also have a margin of 50 pixels on all sides.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a spline chart with a title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The x-axis is labeled with month names from January to December, and the y-axis represents temperature in degrees Celsius. The chart uses a custom color scheme with shades of blue and green, and the background is set to a light gray color. The legend is positioned at the bottom of the chart, centered horizontally. The chart also includes a margin of 50 pixels on all sides to ensure that the content is not too close to the edges. The labels and titles for both axes are styled with a dark gray color and appropriate font sizes for readability.
